document_data.caption: A map showing Dob's Loss and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Dob's Loss
document_data.mainbody: '''Dob's Loss''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Dob's Loss was located in the southwest section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. The road branched west off of the northern tip of the [[Street of the Singing Dolphin]], ending at the [[Field of Triumph]] on [[the Lions]] a short distance away. [[Seawatch Street]] and the [[Street of Whispers]] merged to connect with the western end of Dob's Loss.
